solution_line_template: Oliver's Alien Baseball card collection has {battle_gremlins_cards} / {times_larger_than_alien_baseball} = <<{battle_gremlins_cards}/{times_larger_than_alien_baseball}={alien_baseball_cards}>>{alien_baseball_cards} cards.

Oliver has twice as many Monster Club cards, so he has {alien_baseball_cards} * {monster_club_multiplier} = <<{alien_baseball_cards}*{monster_club_multiplier}={monster_club_cards}>>{monster_club_cards} Monster Club cards.
